localised_text.tooltip_text: Daemonic Glory||Unlock Daemonic Gifts and units by ascribing glory to the four Chaos Gods.
You haven't unlocked all gifts in this set
View Records||View a detailed history of this character's actions on the campaign map.
Replace Lord||You can replace this force's Lord with another, though it may take some time for the original Lord to become available again.

callback_with_context.context_function_id:
GetIfElse( IsOnlyOnCooldown, Loc("ogre_big_name_locked_on_cooldown") , GetIf(IsLocked, GetIfElse(LockReasons.IsEmpty == false, Format("%S
%S", Loc("ogre_big_name_locked"), LockReasons), Loc("ogre_big_name_locked"))) )

localised_text.tooltip_text: View in Offices||Depending on this character's status, it may be possible assign them to an office, granting a number of effects.
Toggle Path to Glory Notifications||If checked, Path to Glory notifications for this character won't be shown on the End Turn button.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | Key.Contains("kho") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Khorne" | Key.Contains("nur") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Nurgle" | Key.Contains("und") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Chaos_Undivided" | Key.Contains("sla") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Slaaensh" | Key.Contains("tze") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Tzeentch"

localised_text.tooltip_text: Bretonnian Lords and Ladies honour the Lady through Vows and Troths. Pledge characters to complete noble actions to acquire each Vow or Troth and receive their particular benefits.

bar_mod.comment: Bar length is intentionally displayed inaccurately to emphasise bonuses!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(Value > ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercent + 0.1, 1), GetIfElse(Value < ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercentBase + 0.1, 1), ValuePercentBase))

name_icon_parent.comment: uses ResizeChildrenToFit callback to shrink stat_name (& thus font size) as the mod_icon list grows

locked_rank.text: Ecantamiento de la Tomenta de Craneos de Sakhmet

quests_subpanel.comment: chars have no more than 4 quests currently

character_context_parent.comment: This component gets passed a CcoCampaignCharacter from code

tx_followers.componentleveltooltip: Followers will join your characters based on their actions on the campaign map and will provide the accompanied character with various effects. {{tr:followers_and_banners_tooltip}}

icon_assigned.componentleveltooltip: This item or follower is currently assigned to %S.

icon_unique.componentleveltooltip: This item is unique, and only available to this character.

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Upkeep||This is the difference in upkeep that will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} each turn if this mount is equipped.

template_item_holder.comment: ContextCommandEvent needs to be on the parent for the visibility to be set properly, since it only gets triggered if the component is visible
ContextCommandEvent needs to be on the parent for the visibility to be set properly, since it only gets triggered if the component is visible

salvage_value.componentleveltooltip: Salvaging the selected items will provide this amount.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | Instant => Format(Loc("character_quest_rank_instant_unlock"), Rank) | IsQuestBattle => Format(Loc("character_quest_rank"), Rank) | Format(Loc("character_quest_rank_mission"), Rank)

list_box.comment: Fill in the context object and context function in order to populate the available list of options for the dropdown menu

selected_context_display.comment: Just fill in the context object and context function to display what information you want about the selected context from the dropdown. Feel free to also add any other children you want like icons, etc that you want to display related to the selected context!

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

name.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

category.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. alert_icon.componentleveltooltip: Now is the time to dedicate to one of the Ruinous Powers... or refuse any master!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (img = this.InitiativeContext.ImagePath) => { img | img.Contains("_nur") => ToColour(206, 246, 0) | img.Contains("_kho") => ToColour(234, 74, 31) | img.Contains("_sla") => ToColour(255, 67, 255) | img.Contains("_tze") => ToColour(99, 206, 234) | img.Contains("_und") => ToColour(250, 213, 0) }

(img = this.InitiativeContext.ImagePath) => { img | img.Contains("_nur") => ToColour(206, 246, 0) | img.Contains("_kho") => ToColour(234, 74, 31) | img.Contains("_sla") => ToColour(255, 67, 255) | img.Contains("_tze") => ToColour(99, 206, 234) | img.Contains("_und") => ToColour(250, 213, 0) }
